member.name: HTTP_QOS_SETTING_TYPE
member.summary: The HTTP_QOS_SETTING_TYPE enumeration identifies the type of a QOS setting contained in a structure.

member.name: HTTP_QOS_SETTING_TYPE.HttpQosSettingTypeBandwidth
member.summary: The setting is a bandwidth limit represented by a structure.

member.name: HTTP_QOS_SETTING_TYPE.HttpQosSettingTypeConnectionLimit
member.summary: The setting is a connection limit represented by a structure.

summary.div: Note Windows Server 2008 R2 and Windows 7 only.
